article: the minor opposition taiwan solidarity union -lrb- tsu -rrb- dismissed monday criticism by the american chamber of commerce -lrb- amcham -rrb- that the tsu has hijacked the government 's policy on china investment .
abstract: tsu urges amcham to care more about taiwan strait security
